Xmas 2015

Jan 1, 2016

Yep. this awful – middle of the moment shot – is the ONLY picture I took for our Christmas.  It was a completely wonderful experience to watch each kiddo hit their most precious place as they end up getting their hearts desire. I LOVED this Christmas
